alert.note: Alert for Greene (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 19 at 4:45PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Greene County through 515 PM EDT... At 444 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southeast of Linton, or 30 miles northeast of Vincennes, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Bloomfield around 500 PM EDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for southwestern Indiana.
